definition: Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
pinyin: Ka1 la3 kun1 lun2 Shan1 mai4

sentences.english: The K2 peak is situated on the Pak-China border in the mighty Karakoram range.
sentences.chinese: 喬戈裏頂峯處於雄偉的喀喇崑崙山脈的中巴邊境上。
